name: Xiangliang Zhang 0001
content: Xiangliang (Lynn) Zhang - College of Engineering Leonard C. Bettex Collegiate Professor of Computer Science, Computer Science and Engineering Contact Email xzhang33@nd.edu Phone 574-631-2110 Office 354 Fitzpatrick Hall of Engineering Areas of Interest Professor Xiangliang Zhang’s research focuses on machine learning, data mining and their application in knowledge discovery. She targets challenging problems that include: learning from complicated and dynamic environments; learning with missing and noisy data; understanding the risk of machine learning models under threats of attacks; discovering novel knowledge in various application domains via knowledge representation learning, extraction and inference. Websites Xiangliang (Lynn) Zhang DBLP Google Scholar Group Website Education Ph.D., Computer Science, INRIA – University Paris Sud, 2010 M.S., Electronic Engineering, Xi’an Jiaotong University, 2006 B.E., Information Engineering, Xi’an Jiaotong University, 2003 News STIR grants energize new science/engineering research projects at Notre Dame ND Engineering welcomes 21 new faculty in 2021 Departments Aerospace and Mechanical Engineering Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering Civil and Environmental Engineering and Earth Sciences Computer Science and Engineering Electrical Engineering
